Class WheelSpinThread

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
WheelSpinThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
class WheelSpinThread
extends java.lang.Thread
The thread which spins the wheel.

  • Constructor Details

    • WheelSpinThread

      public WheelSpinThread​(java.util.Random r, Wheel w)
      Constructs a new WheelSpinThread
      Parameters:
      r - The main random object. MUST BE THE SAME RANDOM OBJECT AS IS USED EVERYWHERE ELSE! Using a new random object WILL result in a client desync.
      w - The wheel to spin

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the thread. Starts to spin the wheel until it either comes to a stop or stopRequested is set to true.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class java.lang.Thread

    • drawWheelWithOffset

      void drawWheelWithOffset​(float offset)
      Draws the wheel object at a given offset
      Parameters:
      offset - The offset to draw the wheel from

    • countCharacterInString

      int countCharacterInString​(java.lang.String s, char c)
      Counts the number of occurrences of a certain character in a String.
      Parameters:
      s - The string to check
      c - The character to count
      Returns:
      The number of occurrences of the character

    • wheelAsString

      java.lang.String[] wheelAsString()
      Converts the Wheel object into a String, [0] is the colourless string and [1] is the coloured string
      Returns:
      An array of strings. [0] is the colourless string and [1] is the coloured string

    • longestNameLength

      int longestNameLength()
      Finds the longest slice text and returns its length
      Returns:
      The length of the longest slice's name
